name: ISpyEnglish
0:
”Alexa, I Spy English.”
”Is it the apple?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i spy english
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Perfect for practicing your English speaking, this fun and educational game has been brought to the Echo Show. There are three different scenes: School Supplies, Breakfast Foods, and Fruits and Vegetables. Alexa will provide hints as you try to guess what object she has randomly selected. You have three guesses to get it right!

Open the game by saying, “Alexa, open I Spy English.” You can make a guess by saying phrases like “Is it the apple?” Make sure you phrase your response as a question. If you don’t get it right on your first guess, Alexa will give you additional hints about the object. You can also either ask Alexa or tap the screen to ask for help or hints. The game will show you how many guesses you have remaining.

If you guess correctly, you win, and Alexa will let you know! If you guess incorrectly three times, Alexa will let you know what item she was thinking of and will ask if you want to play again.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
